vstore.framework.communication.download.threads

Class DownloadHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • vstore.framework.communication.download.threads.DownloadHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DownloadHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    This thread is responsible for handling the download of a file, based on the given download mode. For mode DownloadMode.FROM_SPECIFIED_NODE, please use setNodeInfo(NodeInfo) before.

    • Nested Class Summary
